messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Gahahaha! You’re just a little kid!How’re you supposed to beat a big
man like me?
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Oh my, a big man like me got schooled
by a little kid like you!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Wow, you’re sure impressive!I guess it makes no difference if
you’re young or old in battles.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Hey, you, tough little kid!
Throw us a rematch, will you?
